mapper.insert: insert into development( handle, developType, rating, reliability, activePercentile, activeRank, activeCountryRank, activeSchoolRank, overallPercentile, overallRank, overallCountryRank, overallSchoolRank, volatility) values ( #{item.handle}, #{item.developType}, #{item.rating}, #{item.reliability}, #{item.activePercentile}, #{item.activeRank}, #{item.activeCountryRank}, #{item.activeSchoolRank}, #{item.overallPercentile}, #{item.overallRank}, #{item.overallCountryRank}, #{item.overallSchoolRank}, #{item.volatility})

update.foreach: UPDATE development set rating=#{item.rating}, reliability=#{item.reliability}, activePercentile=#{item.activePercentile}, activeRank=#{item.activeRank}, activeCountryRank=#{item.activeCountryRank}, activeSchoolRank=#{item.activeSchoolRank}, overallPercentile=#{item.overallPercentile}, overallRank=#{item.overallRank}, overallCountryRank=#{item.overallCountryRank}, overallSchoolRank=#{item.overallSchoolRank}, volatility=#{item.volatility} where handle=#{item.handle} and developType=#{ietm.developType}
